title: Federal judge delivers first major AI copyright ruling against startup
author: Skye Jacobs
description: The case, filed in 2020, accused Ross Intelligence of reproducing materials from Thomson Reuters' Westlaw legal research database to build a competing AI-powered legal platform. Judge Bibas...
cntitle: 联邦法官对一家初创公司做出了首个重大 AI 版权裁决
cndescription: 该案件于 2020 年提起，指控 Ross Intelligence 复制了 Thomson Reuters 的 Westlaw 法律研究数据库中的材料，以构建一个具有竞争力的 AI 法律平台。Bibas 法官...
